notes_display: In Historical Sketches of the Paper Currency of the American Colonies by Henry Phillips, Jr. (1865). Given to Dr. Jesse C. Green in 1890. Leaf 56BG.
issue_place_s: Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, United States of America
issue_obverse_legend_s: FOUR SHILLINGS. This Bill shall pass current for FOUR SHILLINGS, according to an Act of GENERAL ASSEMBLY of the Common Wealth of Pennsylvania, passed the Twentieth Day of March, in the Year One Thousand Seven Hundred and Seventy-seven. Dated the Tenth Day of April, A.D. 1777. FOUR SHILLINGS.
issue_reverse_legend_s: Four Shillings. | To Counterfeit is DEATH. | PHILADELPHIA: Printed by JOHN DUNLAP. 1777.
